Method Detail

getPinValue

public boolean getPinValue()
Calculates the overall state of the pin according to the state of its surrounding source blocks.

updateValue

public void updateValue(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                        boolean newVal,
                        InputPin.SourceType source)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
Update the state of one of the blocks surrounding the input block.

Parameters:
loc - The location of the updated block.
newVal - The new redstone current of the block.
source - The source type.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If the block in the provided location is not a source block of the input.

getSourceBlocks

public Iterable<org.bukkit.Location> getSourceBlocks()
Returns:
All source blocks surrounding this input pin.

refreshSourceBlocks

public void refreshSourceBlocks()
refreshes the state of all source blocks according to their block state.

findSourceBlockState

public boolean findSourceBlockState(org.bukkit.Location loc)
Parameters:
loc - The location of the block to check.
Returns:
true if the block is powered and false otherwise.
